info.name: EOL - remove: Discourse forums little modif...
info.description:
The style transferred to https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/407407-discourse-forums-little-modifcations.
Install as user style, How to install?
info.additionalInfo: From now on, you will be able to change your settings from the Stylus add-on, without visiting the site. All you have to do is remove the old style and replace it with a new version: https://greasyfork.org/pl/scripts/407407-discourse-forums-little-modifcations
